body:
Comment 4 by **runningwild**: 
I'd be happy to add a test for linux, I'm assuming something called
mainthread_linux_test.go would be a test that only runs on linux?

The first time this problem showed up for me, though, whether or not I was able to lock
the main thread wasn't deterministic.  I'd be worried that if this problem showed up
again that the test would also not be deterministic.  Is this OK?

Also, would it be worth it to have a similar test for darwin?  I might be able to make
one, but if nothing is actually gained by having it then I won't bother.
